title: Testing Jakarta EE applications with CDI-test
content: This article introduces the Testing framework CDI-Test which you can use to test JakartaEE and Microprofile applications at scale. CDI Test: why you need it First of all: We all love developing in the Java EE ecosystem. Or at least we do since version 5… Or maybe we don’t but our employers do. Partly because ...  The post appeared first on .
